title: #97: Discussing Charles Manson and "Young Charlie"
description:
The RCP Team (Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti) discuss the early life of Charles Manson and break down the new Wondery podcast "Young Charlie." The episode was recorded the day before Manson died on November 19, 2017.


Listen to Young Charlie by going to this link http://wondery.com/wondery/shows/youngcharlie/

New to Real Crime Profile? Never miss an episode by subscribing today at smarturl.it/realcrime

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
